articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: For security, Android phones will now auto-reboot after three days - TechCrunch
articles.description: The update comes months after Apple pushed its own “inactivity reboot” feature.
articles.content:
Googles mobile operating system Android will now automatically reboot if the phone is locked for three days in a row. 
On Monday, the tech giant pushed updates to Google Play services, a core part o… [+1134 chars]

articles.title: Google adds Veo 2 video generation to Gemini app - Ars Technica
articles.description: Video generation starts rolling out today for Gemini Advanced subscribers.
